headline.main: South Korea Says to Act Against China's Discrimination Against South Korean Firms
headline.print_headline: South Korea Says to Act Against China's Discrimination Against South Korean Firms

lead_paragraph: South Korea's trade minister said on Sunday the government's responses against discriminating action by China towards South Korean companies will be strengthened and he feels "deep concern" over recent measures taken by Beijing.
snippet: South Korea's trade minister said on Sunday the government's responses against discriminating action by China towards South Korean companies will be strengthened and he feels "deep concern" over recent measures taken by Beijing....
